title: Morningstar
content:
ngstar's jagged spikes.

Morningstar is one of the Martial Melee Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Versatile, Dippable, etc). Characters need to master certain Proficiency before using a weapon, and sometimes gain special Actions while holding it.

A tuft of hair is caked to the base of one this morningstar's jagged spikes.

Morningstar Location & Where to Find

Location: The Hollow (Druid Grove). Quest: Crafting:
